AboutMe:
Give me a problem; I will solve it.

I enjoy taking thoughts and turning them into living, breathing entities online. I've always been very passionate about my craft and I continue to be to this very day. Standards, best practices and innovating ideas are something that I keep up with as I can in my career.

Think of the user first and work your way backwards to the tech. Communication and quality with regards to timelines.

As I enter into new roles and new projects, I learn the languages/frameworks/tools needed and produce long living products with long term maintenance, performance and readability in mind.
